basics.label: Regional Banking District Manager Vice President
basics.summary: Motivated tenured manager with demonstrated knowledge of industry best practices and operations. Proven skills in enhancing productivity, efficiency and bottom-line profits with forward-thinking leadership. Bringing over twenty years of experience in financial, customer service, sales, problem solving field, with over 15 years management experience. Ready to take on a challenging, growth-oriented role to provide fulfillment and professional purpose.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Regional Banking District Manager Vice President
work.summary: Responsible for leading, growing, and maintaining customer relationships for local branches with 3.5 billion in customer deposits. Oversaw an average of 125 employees, and directly managed and led 11 Branch Managers.
highlights: Revitalized operations and realigned plans to better capture new opportunities and take advantage of changes in customer habits.
Spearheaded routine operations and special program initiatives for regional group, including digital implementation and skill development.
Modeled best practices for sales and customer service.
Located, developed and promoted talented employees.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Encouraged employee development and promoted management staff from within.
highlights: Utilized up-to-date information to make effective decisions governing bank operations.
Defined strategies and made proactive adjustments to maintain results.
Upheld stringent bank standards for loans, money handling and legal considerations.
Reviewed historical records, current operational data and forecasting.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Monitored team performance, adhered to service level agreements.
highlights: Maintained team productivity and quality of service.
Contributed to development, implementation and execution of maintenance programs.

work.name: Company Name
highlights: Investigated and promptly resolved issues with patron accounts.
Identified potential needs through observation, questioning and listening.
Conducted regular proof work and followed up on chargebacks and deposit corrections.
